content:
I remember a long topic here / github about stabilizing core::intrinsics::abort(), with arguments about which backeneds llvm allows you to abort in, and SIGILLs etc.

Couldn't find it and wanted to point out that people are doing double panic on purpose just to abort in no_std: https://github.com/rust-bitcoin/rust-secp256k1/pull/358, so I think we should probably stabilize this intrinsic :)
